sourceMeaningMnemonic: A <radical>sick</radical>ness that hits you like an <radical>arrow</radical> will do its gross work <kanji>rapidly</kanji>. It's not a good thing, you're gonna get really sick really fast.
meaningInfo: Picture this rapid sickness spreading through your body like a cartoon arrow ricocheting through your body. Yuck!
readingMnemonic: This <kanji>rapid</kanji> sickness makes your head pound like there's a <reading>shih tzu</reading> (<ja>しつ</ja>) yapping and barking nonstop. And it's making you sh*t a lot.
readingInfo: Imagine getting sick this rapidly. All of a sudden, there's a shih tzu barking in your head, it hurts! And... oh no, where's the toilet?!
